meanings.definition: A substance formed in body tissues in response to injury
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the doctor explained that the kinin helped with the healing process.
meanings.sent2: The kinin production increased when the body was injured to aid in the recovery.
meanings.sent3: The kinin in my body was like a team of tiny repair workers fixing the damage.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a construction site, with kinin rushing to the scene of the injury.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the kinin as little superheroes swooping in to save the day after the injury.

meanings.definition: A peptide hormone that dilates blood vessels and lowers blood pressure
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed medication to increase the kinin levels and improve blood flow.
meanings.sent2: When the kinin hormone is released, it helps to relax blood vessels and reduce pressure.
meanings.sent3: The kinin hormone was like a gentle breeze, calming the blood vessels and easing the pressure.
meanings.sent4: His body felt relieved as the kinin worked its magic on the blood vessels, like a soothing massage.
meanings.sent5: I pictured the kinin as a friendly traffic controller, directing the flow of blood smoothly through the vessels.
